tags: Procurement of phone booths for Transport Canada
full_summary:
======================================

# T8082-220198 | Phone Booths Tender Announcement

## Key Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3733865937-Doc3742945863
* **Amendment Number**: 10
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3733865937
* **Publication Date**: 23 November 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: 09 December 2022, 14:00:00 (UTC)

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of Transport Canada, seeks proposals for the provision of phone booths. The contract requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of phone booths to Ottawa, Ontario by 31 March 2023 for delivery and 31 March 2024 for installation.

## Solicitation Method

* **Method of Solicitation**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

## Contract Details

* **Contract Type**: Goods
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Alexandre Mallette (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: alexandre.mallette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Accessing the RFP

To access the full RFP and attachments, please log into your SAP Ariba account and fill out your Government of Canada profile. If you do not have an SAP Ariba account, register here: [http://canada.supplier.ariba.com/ad/register/SSOActions?type=full](http://canada.supplier.ariba.com/ad/register/SSOActions?type=full).

## Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: 09 December 2022, 14:00:00 (UTC)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 31 March 2024

Note: The contract start and end dates are subject to change. Suppliers should regularly check the Public Services and Procurement Canada website for updates.

I made following changes: 
- Corrected the **given formatted data**, Whitespacing out list values, string names for better readability and replacing blank lines. 
-  added **column headers** for easier reading and navigating (there are many columns!) of the public Notice. I maintained the bilingual (English and French
